txt.en: Medallions of loyalty are carried by the highest-ranking brigands and half-orcs in the warrens of T没n Melen.\n\nYou have discovered curious medallions carried by the brigands and half-orcs in the warrens of T没n Melen. Emblazoned with an 'S', they denote proven loyalty to Sharkey. You should strip them from their bearers and keep them to return to Radagast.
You have collected a few medallions of loyalty from Sharkey's Men in the warrens of T没n Melen.
You have collected several medallions of loyalty from Sharkey's Men. With their bearers defeated, you have disrupted Sharkey's efforts to gain a stronger foothold in the Vales of Anduin.
Collect medallions of loyalty from Sharkey's Men ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Collected medallions of loyalty from Sharkey's Men ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Collect medallions of loyalty from Sharkey's Men
Sharkey has entrusted the newest excavation in the Gladden Fields to the most loyal and cunning of his followers.

After encountering a number of Sharkey's Men in the warrens of T没n Melen, you have noticed that some of them bear curious medallions emblazoned with an 'S', signifying their loyalty to Sharkey.\n\nYou should collect these medallions from Sharkey's Men and keep them to deliver to Radagast.
